item.title: XKCD: Bad Map Projection: Exterior Kansas

img.title: Although Kansas is widely thought to contain the geographic center of the contiguous 48 states, topologists now believe that it's actually their outer edge.
img.alt: Although Kansas is widely thought to contain the geographic center of the contiguous 48 states, topologists now believe that it's actually their outer edge.

item.title: TheOatmeal: Godcat has a special message for you

img.alt: Godcat has a special message for you

description.p: Your lord and savior, Godcat, has a favor to ask regarding his new Netflix series.

img.title: We're right under the flight path for the scheduled orbital launch, but don't worry--it's too cold out for the rockets to operate safely, so I'm sure they'll postpone.
img.alt: We're right under the flight path for the scheduled orbital launch, but don't worry--it's too cold out for the rockets to operate safely, so I'm sure they'll postpone.

img.title: If you repeatedly rerun the development of technological civilization, it turns out that for some reason the only constant is that there is always a networking utility called 'netcat', though it does a different thing in each one.
img.alt: If you repeatedly rerun the development of technological civilization, it turns out that for some reason the only constant is that there is always a networking utility called 'netcat', though it does a different thing in each one.

img.title: An idling gas engine may be annoyingly loud, but that's the price you pay for having WAY less torque available at a standstill.
img.alt: An idling gas engine may be annoyingly loud, but that's the price you pay for having WAY less torque available at a standstill.

item.title: SafelyEndangered: Ep. 981 - The Wizard and the Frog
LovingReaper: HI! I'M CHARLIE!
item.description: Senior pets have a hard time getting adopted. The likelihood of adoption is only 25% compared to 60% for a younger dog. Unfortunately, this is often due to prejudice. I want to raise awareness with this comic (and also get back to my roots, which I haven't really managed to do yet). But I want to start uploading more regularly again. Thank you for your patience so far.

item.title: LovingReaper: Funeral
item.description:
Did you know that crows hold "funerals" for their dead?
By the way: Boris is real and lives with John in the Netherlands. John found him badly injured and unable to fly, he would be lost in the wild. John has been looking after Boris for years and lets him out into the wild (under guard) as often as possible. John also works with Boris to educate people about crows and wildlife. Amazing Team!

item.title: PixieAndBrutus: Memory
item.description: Minnesota is known as "The Land of Ten Thousand Lakes" but actually we have closer to fourteen thousand that are 10 acres or larger.

item.description: Would you have him deliver a message? Would you trust him with that?

item.title: LovingReaper: Dear Trixi
item.description: My best friend died. As you may have noticed, my dog lost her battle against her tumor last month. The dog that inspired so many of my comics and was always by my side. This is the most painful piece, but it was therapeutic in a way to say goodbye to Trixi in this way. Goodbye my "curly banana", you were loved so so much...

item.title: LovingReaper: Follow me
item.description: I have not only a little Christmas story for you, but also a continuation of "Black Cats". Because I don't want to leave you sad for the holidays, you'll get to know Reaper's secret little helper. Even the cold can harbor so much goodness. Wish you a wonderful time :)

item.title: LovingReaper: Pumkin time
item.description: I had a quick idea for a bittersweet Halloween comic. Please pay close attention to where your cats hide outside when it is cold ‚ù§ Happy Halloween! ÔøΩÔøΩ

item.title: LovingReaper: Sing - *small update*
item.description: (Please excuse that this month was a bit quiet, I was really ill and my body was at it's end üòû but it's getting better and I'll go back to creating comics very soon!)

item.title: LovingReaper: Swap

Little summer special for you ÔøΩÔøΩ It's a bit different from my usual content but I need something funny inbetween to stay sane :')
ALSO, Loving Reaper is part of webtoon's official merch campain! You can check it out at https://shopwebtoon.com/

item.title: LovingReaper: Wait!
item.description: Really not my best work.... but I wanted to upload it anyway because the topic is very important and I'm tired of reading about these avoidable tragedies every year. EVERY. DAMN. YEAR.
